task.title: Create a new topic
task.shortdesc: Create a new topic for each distinct but complete subject matter you need to write about. For example, you would create a new topic to write a task about performing a procedure that has a set of steps.

context.p: There are three main topic types to choose from: concept, task, and reference. See for more information.

step.cmd: In the top menu, select New.
Select the topic type you need.
step.stepresult: A new topic opens for you with default, placeholder parts and text. The Guidance panel opens on the left. The toolbar displays above.

step.cmd: Add your content, using the Guidance panel and toolbar options.
Save or check in your topic.
step.info: Your options for saving your work depend on what integrations you are working with.
